docs.text: This is a beautiful documentation site built with MkDocs and the Shadcn theme. Features 🎨 Modern and elegant design based on shadcn/ui 🌙 Dark mode support 📱 Fully responsive 🔍 Fast and efficient search 📊 Support for charts and diagrams 🧩 Rich component ecosystem Getting Started Check out the documentation to learn more about how to use this theme. Quick Installation pip install mkdocs-shadcn Add the following to your mkdocs.yml : theme : name : shadcn
